title: New: KLOË – Grip
body:
[Photo](https://www.

facebook.com/emilywyldephotography) This stunning debut track from eighteen year old Glaswegian singer **KLOË **has already received praise from the likes of DIY Mag and XFM, and quite rightly so. Bold, dramatic and wonderfully over the top, there’s touches of Lykke Li, Lana Del Rey, and of course the obvious comparison, Lorde, in the occasional foreboding darkness that seeps in. Check out _Grip_ below.
